软件包 jcurses.util

类摘要
Message This is a class to create and show user defined messages.
Paging A utility class to handle paging in components.
Profiler This a library-intern class for performance meausrement.
Protocol This class implements the debugging for jcurses applications.
Rectangle This is a class to represent an screen rectangle.
ScrollbarUtils This class is used be widgets to painting scrollbars.
